item.title: 《时代》杂志公布年度最佳发明公布：DeepSeek R1、AirPods Pro 3 上榜
item.guid: 《时代》杂志公布年度最佳发明公布：DeepSeek-R1、AirPods-Pro-3-上榜
item.description:
Yesterday, Time magazine officially released its 2025 "Best Inventions" list, featuring 300 innovative achievements from around the world, covering various fields such as artificial intelligence, consumer electronics, healthcare, and green energy. 昨天，《时代》杂志正式发布 2025 年度「最佳发明」榜单，共收录 300 项来自全球的创新成果，涵盖人工智能、消费电子、医疗健康、绿色能源等多个领域。

In the artificial intelligence sector, the DeepSeek R1 large model developed by a Chinese team was successfully selected. With its core advantages of low cost and high efficiency, the model is considered a strong challenge to the existing landscape of large language models, demonstrating China's new breakthroughs in global AI competition. 在人工智能板块，中国团队研发的 DeepSeek R1 大模型成功入选。该模型以低成本、高效率为核心优势，被认为是对现有大型语言模型格局的有力挑战，展现了中国在全球 AI 竞争中的新突破。

In the consumer electronics category, Apple's newly launched AirPods Pro 3 was also selected for its multiple groundbreaking features. 在消费电子类别中，苹果最新推出的 AirPods Pro 3 也凭借多项突破性功能入选。

Building on upgraded noise cancellation, AirPods Pro 3 for the first time incorporates an optical heart rate sensor, capable of real-time monitoring of user health and, when necessary, functioning as a hearing aid. AirPods Pro 3 在降噪效果升级的基础上，首次加入光学心率传感器，可实时监测用户健康状况、在必要时还可充当助听器。

This time, Time magazine highlighted the "real-time translation" feature launched with AirPods Pro 3. It is reported that this feature supports instant interpretation between multiple languages, including English, French, German, Spanish, and Portuguese, and will be expanded to include Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Italian by the end of the year. 本次《时代》杂志重点提及了随 AirPods Pro 3 一同推出的「实时翻译」功能。据悉，该功能支持英语、法语、德语、西班牙语和葡萄牙语等多种语言之间的即时传译，年底还将扩展至中文、日语、韩语和意大利语。

It is worth noting that OpenAI had "zero entries" on this list, with no work making it into the annual best inventions. 值得注意的是，本次榜单 OpenAI「零入选」，没有一项工作进入年度最佳发明。

Time's editors commented that these selected products "not only transformed user experience but also pushed the boundaries of industry expansion." 《时代》编辑评价称，这些入选产品 「不仅改变了用户体验，也推动了行业边界的拓展」 。

In addition to DeepSeek R1 and AirPods Pro 3, several Huawei products were also selected, including Pura 80 Ultra and Watch GT 6 Pro; Claude Sonnet 4 and Cursor are also on the list, with other products including cutting-edge tech like Figure 03, Unitree R1, and Meta Ray-Ban Display. 除 DeepSeek R1 与 AirPods Pro 3 外，华为也有多款产品入选，包括 Pura 80 Ultra、Watch GT 6 Pro；Claude Sonnet 4、Cursor 也同样在列，其他产品还包括 Figure 03、宇树 Unitree R1、Meta Ray-Ban Display 等前沿科技产品。

item.title: 苹果被曝下周发布多款新品
item.guid: 苹果被曝下周发布多款新品
item.description:
According to a recent prediction by overseas blogger "Vadim Yuryev", Apple may release several new products next week, specifically: 据海外博主「Vadim Yuryev」日前预测消息，苹果或会在下周发布多款新品，具体如下：

    MacBook Pro, iPad Pro, and Vision Pro with M5 chips;

    M5 version Mac mini and iMac are expected to debut;

    AirTag 2, HomePod mini 2, and the new Apple TV 4K may also be unveiled.

According to Vadim Yuryev, this wave of new products will last for three days. It's worth noting that Apple will not hold a new product launch event this time, but will release new products via press releases. 据 Vadim Yuryev 表示，本次新品潮将为期三天。值得一提的是，本次苹果并不会举办新品发布会，而是以新闻稿的形式进行新品发布。

In addition, clues such as the leaked M5-powered iPad Pro and FCC documents unexpectedly confirming Apple's new Vision Pro all indicate that Apple will have major new moves in October. 此外搭载 M5 芯片的 iPad Pro 泄露、FCC 文件意外证实了苹果新版 Vision Pro 等线索，均表明苹果在 10 月会有重磅新动作。

According to earlier news from Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman, the supply of iPad Pro M4 and entry-level 14-inch MacBook Pro is limited in Apple retail stores and online channels, with some configurations even experiencing delays, which is a clear sign that Apple is about to launch new M5 products. 另据彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 此前消息，iPad Pro M4 和入门款 14 英寸 MacBook Pro 在苹果零售店及线上渠道的供应数量有限，部分配置甚至出现延迟，而这也是苹果一个即将推出 M5 新品的明确迹象。

item.title: 小鹏汽车智驾一号位换帅
item.guid: 小鹏汽车智驾一号位换帅
item.description:
According to LatePost Auto, on October 9, Xpeng Motors' autonomous driving center issued an internal letter: Li Liyun will no longer serve as the head of the autonomous driving center, and Liu Xianming (Xianming Liu), head of the world foundation model, will take over the position. 据晚点 Auto 报道，10 月 9 日，小鹏汽车自动驾驶中心发布内部信： 李力耘不再担任自动驾驶中心负责人，世界基座模型负责人刘先明（Xianming Liu）接替该职位。

It is reported that Liu Xianming received his Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in 2016. He previously worked at Facebook (now Meta) and Cruise, a self-driving company under General Motors, engaging in cutting-edge research in machine learning and computer vision. 据悉，刘先明 2016 年博士毕业于伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校电气和计算机工程专业，曾在 Facebook（现 Meta）、通用汽车旗下的自动驾驶公司 Cruise 任职，从事机器学习与计算机视觉领域的前沿研究工作。

In March 2024, Liu Xianming joined Xpeng Motors as the head of the Xpeng AI team. In June this year, he appeared as the head of Xpeng's world foundation model and had reported directly to He Xiaopeng, Chairman and CEO of Xpeng Motors, before this personnel change. 2024 年 3 月，刘先明加入小鹏汽车，担任小鹏 AI 团队负责人，今年 6 月曾以小鹏世界基座模型负责人的身份亮相，在本次人事变动前已直接向小鹏汽车董事长兼 CEO 何小鹏汇报。

According to sources close to Xpeng Motors, He Xiaopeng has recently had frequent in-depth discussions with Liu Xianming regarding large models for autonomous driving. Another insider stated that Liu Xianming's previous AI research at Xpeng was already providing necessary software support for both the chip and embodied AI teams. 据接近小鹏汽车的人士透露，何小鹏近期频繁与刘先明就自动驾驶大模型展开深入交流。另一位知情人士称，刘先明之前在小鹏从事的 AI 研究已经同时在为芯片、具身团队提供必要软件支持。

The report states that this adjustment marks another major personnel shake-up in Xpeng's autonomous driving department since August 2023. At that time, Wu Xinzhou, Vice President of Xpeng Motors' autonomous driving, resigned to join Nvidia, and Li Liyun, then head of the planning and control department, took over as Xpeng's head of autonomous driving. 报道称，此次调整是自 2023 年 8 月以来，小鹏自动驾驶部门的再一次人事巨震。彼时，小鹏汽车自动驾驶副总裁吴新宙离职加入英伟达，小鹏自动驾驶负责人由时任规划控制部门负责人李力耘接任。

It is worth mentioning that Li Liyun is still employed. 值得一提的是，李力耘仍在职。

Regarding the above situation, Xpeng responded: 对于上述情况，小鹏方面回应称：

The autonomous driving VLA large model is an important application of the world foundation model, but what's more challenging is enabling the world foundation model to deduce the entire world. Dr. Liu Xianming has a background in cutting-edge research in machine learning and computer vision, making him an outstanding technical expert in artificial intelligence and autonomous driving. He will lead the team to accelerate the comprehensive application of Xpeng's physical world foundation large model in the AI car domain and expand the generational lead in intelligent assisted driving.

item.title: 山姆公布大疆降价补偿方案
item.guid: 山姆公布大疆降价补偿方案
item.description:
Recently, DJI announced that it will kick off its Double Eleven shopping festival on October 9, with significant price reductions on many popular products, including Pocket 3, Action 4, DJI Mini 3, and more, with discounts up to 1478 yuan. 日前，大疆宣布将在 10 月 9 日开启双十一狂欢，多款热门产品大幅降价，包含 Pocket 3、Action 4、DJI Mini 3 等产品，最高优惠达 1478 元。

After the announcement, "DJI price drop pre-announcement: consumers who already bought products seek refunds and rights protection" trended on Weibo. Many consumers who had just purchased DJI products that were about to be discounted began to assert their rights on shopping platforms and social media, seeking price differences. 消息宣布后，「大疆预告降价已购买消费者退货维权」冲上微博热搜，不少刚刚购买了大疆即将降价产品的消费者开始在购物平台、社交媒体上维权，争取退差价。

According to Jiemian News, in response to the above situation, Sam's Club stated on October 10 that since the (DJI) promotional event began, Sam's Club has actively communicated and coordinated with the brand to quickly formulate a member compensation plan to ensure that members' rights and interests are fully protected. 据界面新闻报道，针对上述情况，山姆在 10 月 10 日回应称，自（大疆）促销活动开展后，山姆积极与品牌方沟通协调，迅速制定会员补偿方案，以确保会员权益得到充分保障。

Sam's Club stated that, for this promotion, members who purchased the product between October 2 and October 8, 2025, can present their proof of purchase at an offline store before October 31 to enjoy a special subsidy service. 山姆方面表示， 针对此次促销，在 2025 年 10 月 2 日 – 8 日期间购买该商品的会员可凭购买凭证，在 10 月 31 日前到线下门店享受特殊补贴服务。

item.title: 苹果高管洗牌：硬件主管或成库克接班人
item.guid: 苹果高管洗牌：硬件主管或成库克接班人
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Apple is undergoing a high-level organizational restructuring to address the retirement of COO Jeff Williams at the end of the year. The focus of this adjustment is to integrate health and fitness businesses into the services division, highlighting the company's strategic upgrade in the health sector. 据彭博社报道，苹果公司正在进行高层架构调整，以应对 COO Jeff Williams 年底退休的变动。此次调整的重点是将健康与健身业务纳入服务部门，凸显公司在健康领域的战略升级。

Sources revealed that Eddy Cue, who has long been responsible for services like Apple TV+ and Apple Music, will take over Apple's health and fitness team and be in charge of the upcoming subscription service 'Health+'. 消息人士透露，长期负责 Apple TV+、Apple Music 等服务业务的 Eddy Cue 将接管苹果的健康与健身团队，并负责即将推出的订阅服务「Health+」。

The service is expected to launch in 2026, with its core function being to provide users with personalized nutrition, exercise, and sleep advice through an AI assistant. 该服务预计在 2026 年上线，核心功能是通过人工智能助手为用户提供个性化的营养、运动和睡眠建议。

Meanwhile, Craig Federighi, head of software engineering, will take over the management of Apple Watch's operating system, watchOS. This is Federighi's second expansion of power this year, having previously taken charge of Siri and Vision Pro's operating system, visionOS. 与此同时，软件工程负责人 Craig Federighi 将接手 Apple Watch 操作系统 watchOS 的管理工作。这是 Federighi 今年第二次扩权，他此前已接管 Siri 和 Vision Pro 的操作系统 visionOS。

Hardware chief John Ternus will also gain greater authority, taking full responsibility for Apple Watch hardware engineering. Notably, Ternus is widely regarded as a potential successor to CEO Tim Cook. 硬件主管 John Ternus 也将获得更大权力，全面负责 Apple Watch 硬件工程。值得注意的是，Ternus 被外界视为 CEO Tim Cook 的潜在接班人。

Within the health and fitness team, departments previously led by Sumbul Desai and Jay Blahnik will merge, with Desai taking unified management and reporting directly to Eddy Cue. 在健康与健身团队内部，原本分别由 Sumbul Desai 和 Jay Blahnik 领导的部门将合并，由 Desai 统一管理，并直接向 Eddy Cue 汇报。

With Williams' departure, Apple's supply chain, operations, AppleCare, and China business have been transferred to the new head of operations, Sabih Khan. 随着 Williams 的离任，苹果的供应链、运营、AppleCare 以及中国业务已移交给新任运营主管 Sabih Khan。

In the future, Apple will face more executive changes, including the successor to AI head John Giannandrea, and the retirement plan of Lisa Jackson, head of environment and government affairs. 未来，苹果还将面临更多高管变动，包括 AI 负责人 John Giannandrea 的继任人选，以及环境与政府事务主管 Lisa Jackson 的退休计划。

item.title: 微软启动新一轮裁员，补偿「N+4」
item.guid: 微软启动新一轮裁员，补偿「N+4」
item.description:
According to Phoenix News, Microsoft sent an email titled 'Important Business Update' to some teams in Shanghai on the 9th, confirming the start of a new round of layoffs. 据凤凰网报道，微软 9 日在上海部分团队内部发出标题为「Important Business Update」的邮件，确认新一轮裁员启动。

According to multiple employees, this round primarily affects the Azure cloud business team, with a compensation package of 'N+4' and no additional signing bonus. 据多名员工透露，本次主要波及 Azure 云业务团队，补偿方案为「N+4」，未包含额外签字费。

Some employees stated that the company had previously offered the option to relocate to Australia, and those who did not accept would face layoffs. 有员工表示，此前公司曾提供 relocate（工作调动）至澳大利亚的选项，如不接受则面临裁员。

In July this year, Microsoft laid off approximately 9,000 people globally, with the domestic CSS (Customer Service and Support) team being significantly affected, and compensation packages reaching up to 'N+7'. 今年 7 月，微软曾在全球范围裁员约 9000 人，当时国内 CSS（客户服务与支持部）团队受影响较大，补偿方案最高可达「N+7」。

Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella emphasized in an internal memo that layoffs are 'the toughest decision,' but the company is at a critical juncture in its transformation from a traditional software enterprise to an 'AI-first' organization. 微软董事长兼 CEO 萨蒂亚·纳德拉在内部备忘录中强调，裁员是「最艰难的决定」，但公司正处于由传统软件企业向「AI 优先」组织转型的关键期。

Nadella has publicly stated that approximately 30% of the company's code is currently generated by artificial intelligence, and this proportion continues to rise. 纳德拉曾公开表示，目前公司约 30% 的代码由人工智能生成，比例仍在持续上升。

According to statistics, since 2023, Microsoft has cumulatively laid off over 15,000 people, affecting Azure cloud, global sales, and engineering teams. Meanwhile, the company continues to recruit for technical support and outsourcing positions in markets with lower labor costs, such as Malaysia and India. 据统计，自 2023 年以来，微软已累计裁员超过 1.5 万人，涉及 Azure 云、全球销售及工程团队。与此同时，公司在马来西亚、印度等人力成本较低的市场持续招聘技术支持与外包岗位。

Financial reports show that Microsoft's revenue in Q4 FY2025 increased by 18% year-over-year to $76.44 billion, with net profit growing by 24% to $27.23 billion. Azure cloud business revenue for the full year exceeded $75 billion, a 34% year-over-year increase. 财报显示，微软 2025 财年第四财季营收同比增长 18% 至 764.4 亿美元，净利润增长 24% 至 272.3 亿美元。Azure 云业务全年营收超过 750 亿美元，同比增长 34%。

The market generally believes that layoffs and cost optimization measures have helped Microsoft maintain profit margins while increasing AI investments. 市场普遍认为，裁员与成本优化措施帮助微软在加大 AI 投入的同时保持利润率。

Analysts point out that Microsoft plans to invest up to $80 billion in AI data centers and infrastructure construction in fiscal year 2025, and is expected to continue maintaining cash flow and profit margins through layoffs and other means in the future. 分析人士指出，微软计划在 2025 财年投入高达 800 亿美元用于 AI 数据中心与基础设施建设，预计未来仍将通过裁员等方式维持现金流和利润空间。

item.title: ChatGPT 周活跃用户破 8 亿，规模超竞争对手总和
item.guid: ChatGPT-周活跃用户破-8-亿，规模超竞争对手总和
item.description:
According to Business Insider, at the recent DevDay conference, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced the latest data: ChatGPT's weekly active users have reached 800 million. 据 Business Insider 报道，在近期举行的 DevDay 大会上，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 公布了最新数据： ChatGPT 的周活跃用户已达到 8 亿人次。

This figure has not only doubled in the past four months but also surpassed the combined total of its five major competitors, including Meta AI, Gemini, xAI, Claude, and Perplexity. 这一数字不仅在过去四个月内实现翻倍增长，更是超过了包括 Meta AI、Gemini、xAI、Claude 和 Perplexity 在内的五大竞争对手的总和。

According to statistics, if calculated by weekly active users, ChatGPT's monthly active user base is approximately 3.2 billion, while the combined total of the other five major competitors is only 1.575 billion. Even if the latter were doubled, it would still be slightly less than ChatGPT's overall scale. 根据统计，若以周活跃用户数推算，ChatGPT 的月活跃用户规模约为 32 亿，而其余五家主要对手合计仅为 15.75 亿。即便将后者翻倍，仍略低于 ChatGPT 的整体规模。

Altman stated at the conference: "Thanks to all users, AI has transformed from a tool people tried and explored into a core platform for daily building and use." Altman 在会上表示：「感谢所有用户，AI 已经从人们尝试和探索的工具，变成了日常构建和使用的核心平台。」

The timeline shows that ChatGPT first surpassed 100 million weekly active users in November 2023, reached 400 million by February 2025, surged to 700 million in August this year, and has now set a new record. 时间线显示，ChatGPT 在 2023 年 11 月首次突破 1 亿周活跃用户，至 2025 年 2 月已达到 4 亿，而在今年 8 月则冲至 7 亿，如今再度刷新纪录。

item.title: 索尼携手 AMD 公布三大图形技术，或率先应用于次世代主机
item.guid: 索尼携手-AMD-公布三大图形技术，或率先应用于次世代主机
item.description:
According to EUROGAMER, Sony and AMD recently jointly announced three key graphics technologies, which are expected to be applied in the next-generation PlayStation 6 and future AMD graphics card products. 据 EUROGAMER 报道，索尼与 AMD 日前联合公布三项关键图形技术，预计将应用于下一代 PlayStation 6 以及未来的 AMD 显卡产品。

These three technologies are "Neural Arrays," "Radiance Cores," and "Universal Compression," aiming to enhance ray tracing efficiency, optimize image upscaling and denoising, and significantly improve memory bandwidth utilization: 这三项技术分别为「Neural Arrays」「Radiance Cores」和「Universal Compression」，旨在提升光线追踪效率、优化图像放大与降噪处理，并显著改善显存带宽利用率：

    Neural Arrays: By connecting multiple compute units in a "smart and efficient" manner to form a structure similar to a "single AI engine," it supports larger-scale machine learning models and accelerates image upscaling and denoising algorithms.

    Radiance Cores: Dedicated cores are added inside the GPU (theoretically similar to Nvidia's RT Cores) for unified processing of ray and path tracing tasks.

    Universal Compression: Compresses all data transmitted to video memory, not just texture data, thereby increasing effective bandwidth, reducing power consumption, and further enhancing the performance of the first two technologies.

Mark Cerny, Sony PS5 system architect, and Jack Huynh, AMD Senior Vice President, stated that these technologies are currently still in the simulation phase, but will be extended to "all gaming platforms" in the future, including not only home consoles but also potentially PC graphics cards and handheld devices. 索尼 PS5 系统架构师 Mark Cerny 与 AMD 高级副总裁 Jack Huynh 表示，这些技术目前仍处于模拟阶段，但未来将推广至「所有游戏平台」，不仅包括家用主机，也可能覆盖 PC 显卡与掌机设备。

item.title: 微软新 Xbox 或成史上最强主机，「Magnus」 APU 实物与参数泄露
item.guid: 微软新-Xbox-或成史上最强主机，「Magnus」-APU-实物与参数泄露
item.description:
According to TweakTown, leaks suggest that Microsoft's next-generation Xbox console will feature an AMD semi-custom APU codenamed "Magnus," with full specifications and actual photos already exposed. The chip uses a Zen 6 architecture CPU and RDNA 5 GPU, targeting a 2027 release. 据 TweakTown 报道，有爆料称，微软下一代 Xbox 主机将搭载代号为「Magnus」的 AMD 半定制 APU，完整规格与实物照片已被曝光。该芯片采用 Zen 6 架构 CPU 与 RDNA 5 GPU，目标在 2027 年推出。

It is understood that the "Magnus" APU integrates up to 68 RDNA 5 compute units, the GPU is equipped with at least 24MB of L2 cache, and the CPU part consists of 3 Zen 6 large cores and 8 Zen 6c small cores, with 12MB of L3 cache. 据悉，「Magnus」 APU 集成了多达 68 个 RDNA 5 计算单元，GPU 至少配备 24MB L2 缓存，CPU 部分由 3 个 Zen 6 大核与 8 个 Zen 6c 小核组成，拥有 12MB L3 缓存。

Regarding memory, the new console will support a 192-bit bus and can be equipped with up to 48GB of GDDR7 video memory, far exceeding the rumored 40GB for PlayStation 6. 内存方面，新主机将支持 192-bit 总线，最高可搭载 48GB GDDR7 显存，远超此前传闻中 PlayStation 6 的 40GB。

Additionally, the APU also has a built-in NPU, supporting two power modes: providing up to 110 TOPS of computing power at 6W, and 46 TOPS at 1.2W, primarily for AI-related tasks. The entire chip area is approximately 408mm², with an estimated power consumption between 250W and 350W. 此外，该 APU 还内置一颗 NPU，支持两种功耗模式：在 6W 下可提供最高 110 TOPS 的算力，在 1.2W 下则为 46 TOPS，主要用于 AI 相关任务。整颗芯片面积约为 408mm²，预计功耗在 250W 至 350W 之间。

item.title: 字节：被动离职员工可获每月最高 1.2 万元补贴
item.guid: 字节：被动离职员工可获每月最高-1.2-万元补贴
item.description:
According to The Paper, citing sources from ByteDance, the company has implemented a new employee protection plan starting this month: for full-time employees in mainland China who are passively laid off due to organizational adjustments, in addition to the original economic compensation, a transitional subsidy of up to 12,000 yuan per month for a maximum of 6 months will be provided, with a total maximum of 72,000 yuan. 据澎湃新闻援引字节跳动相关人士报道，该公司已于本月起实施新的员工保障方案：针对中国内地因组织调整被动离职的正式员工，在原有经济补偿基础上，额外提供最长 6 个月、每月最高 1.2 万元的过渡性补贴，总额最高可达 7.2 万元。

The subsidy consists of two parts: "social security subsidy" and "living allowance": 补贴由「社保补贴」与「生活补贴」两部分组成：

    Social security subsidy of 2,000 yuan/month for first-tier cities (Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Hangzhou), and 1,500 yuan/month for other cities;

    Living allowance is provided at 20% of the pre-tax monthly fixed income, with a minimum of 4,000 yuan/month for first-tier cities, 3,000 yuan/month for other cities, and a cap of 10,000 yuan/month for all cities.

Eligible employees need to pay their social security contributions independently through flexible employment after leaving the company and provide relevant proof. 符合条件的员工需在离职后通过灵活就业方式自行缴纳社保，并提供相关凭证。

This policy also applies to former employees who left due to organizational adjustments within the past 6 months and are currently in flexible employment; they can receive subsidies for the remaining period. 该政策同样适用于过去 6 个月内因组织调整离职、目前仍处于灵活就业状态的前员工，他们可领取剩余周期的补贴。

item.title: AI 聊天伴侣应用曝严重漏洞：40 万用户聊天记录外泄
item.guid: AI-聊天伴侣应用曝严重漏洞：40-万用户聊天记录外泄
item.description:
According to cybernews, two foreign AI chat companion apps, "Chattee Chat" and "GiMe Chat," were recently exposed for severe data leakage issues, with over 400,000 users' private conversations, photos, and videos publicly exposed. 据 cybernews 报道，国外两款 AI 聊天伴侣应用「Chattee Chat」与「GiMe Chat」近日被曝存在严重数据泄露问题， 超过 40 万用户的私密对话、照片与视频遭到公开暴露。

Researchers pointed out that the developers did not enable any access control or authentication when deploying Kafka Broker instances, leading to a large amount of data, including 43 million messages and over 600,000 images and videos, being directly accessible externally. 研究人员指出，开发商在部署 Kafka Broker 实例时未启用任何访问控制与身份验证，导致包括 4300 万条消息、60 万余张图片与视频在内的大量数据可被外部直接访问。

The leaked information also includes user IP addresses, device identifiers, and in-app purchase records. Some users invested up to $18,000 in the app. 泄露信息还包含用户 IP 地址、设备标识符以及应用内购买记录。部分用户在应用中投入金额高达 1.8 万美元。

Before the incident came to light, "Chattee" once ranked 121st among entertainment apps in the Apple App Store, with over 300,000 cumulative downloads and hundreds of positive reviews, indicating its popularity among users. 事件曝光前，「Chattee」在苹果 App Store 娱乐类应用中一度排名第 121 位，累计下载量超过 30 万次，并获得数百条正面评价，显示其在用户群体中颇具人气。

Currently, "Chattee Chat" has been removed from Google Play, and the developer is now guiding users to install it via APK sideloading. Although the company emphasizes "attaching great importance to user information security" in its privacy policy, the actual situation reveals significant flaws in its security measures. 目前，「Chattee Chat」已从 Google Play 下架，开发商转而引导用户通过 APK 文件侧载安装。尽管该公司在隐私政策中强调「高度重视用户信息安全」，但实际情况显示其安全措施存在明显缺陷。

Security experts warn that if such data is exploited by criminals, it could lead to risks such as identity correlation, harassment, or even extortion. The research team reminds users that the privacy of AI chat companion apps is far less secure than developers claim, and caution is needed when using them. 安全专家警告称，这类数据一旦被不法分子利用，可能引发身份关联、骚扰甚至勒索等风险。研究团队提醒用户，AI 聊天伴侣类应用的私密性远不如开发商宣称，使用时需谨慎。

item.title: 法院：「自动驾驶」不能当醉驾挡箭牌
item.guid: 法院：「自动驾驶」不能当醉驾挡箭牌
item.description:
According to reports from People's Daily, the Beijing No. 2 Intermediate People's Court recently heard a drunk driving case triggered by "autonomous driving." The defendant, Mr. Yan, was caught driving after consuming alcohol, with a blood alcohol content as high as 201.4 mg/100 ml. 据人民日报报道，北京市第二中级人民法院近日审理了一起因「自动驾驶」引发的醉驾案件。被告人闫某某在饮酒后驾驶车辆，途中被查获，其血液酒精含量高达 201.4 毫克/100 毫升。

The first-instance court found his actions constituted the crime of dangerous driving, sentencing him to 3 months of detention and a fine of 6,000 yuan. Mr. Yan appealed, arguing that the vehicle had "autonomous driving capabilities," which reduced road danger, and requested a lighter sentence. 一审法院认定其行为已构成危险驾驶罪，判处拘役 3 个月，并处罚金 6000 元。闫某某不服，提出上诉，辩称车辆具备「自动驾驶功能」，道路危险性降低，请求从轻处罚。

The second-instance court, after deliberation, held that the existing evidence failed to prove the vehicle was in an autonomous driving state when it was apprehended. 二审法院经审理认为，现有证据未能证明车辆在被查获时处于自动驾驶状态。

Even if the driving assistance system was activated, according to the national standard "Classification of Driving Automation for Vehicles," levels 0-2 are merely driving assistance and still require full supervision by the driver, unable to replace the primary driver. The vehicle driven by Mr. Yan was only equipped with driving assistance functions, which have a high dependency on the driver and cannot be used as a reason for a reduced penalty. 即便开启了驾驶辅助系统，根据国家标准《汽车驾驶自动化分级》，0—2 级仅为驾驶辅助，仍需驾驶人全程监管，不能替代驾驶主体。闫某某驾驶的车辆仅配置驾驶辅助功能，对驾驶员依赖性较高，不能作为减轻处罚的理由。

Ultimately, the Beijing No. 2 Intermediate People's Court rejected the appeal and upheld the original judgment. The presiding judge emphasized: "The safety bottom line cannot be crossed. After the driving assistance system is activated, the driver still bears full driving responsibility." 最终，北京二中院驳回上诉，维持原判。承办法官强调：「安全底线不能逾越。驾驶辅助系统激活后，驾驶人仍需承担全部驾驶责任。」

The court reminded that activating driving assistance functions while intoxicated still constitutes drunk driving, and the driver must bear corresponding criminal responsibility. 法院提醒，醉酒状态下启用驾驶辅助功能，仍属于醉驾行为，驾驶人必须承担相应刑事责任。

item.title: 机构：联想蝉联全球市占率第一
item.guid: 机构：联想蝉联全球市占率第一
item.description:
The latest "Worldwide Quarterly Personal Computing Device Tracker" report released by International Data Corporation (IDC) shows that global traditional PC market shipments (including desktops, notebooks, and workstations) reached 75.9 million units in the third quarter of 2025, a year-on-year increase of 9.4%. 国际数据公司（IDC）发布的最新《全球季度个人计算设备追踪报告》显示，2025 年第三季度全球传统 PC 市场（包括台式机、笔记本电脑和工作站）出货量达到 7590 万台，同比增长 9.4%。

In terms of market share, Lenovo maintained its global No. 1 position with 19.4 million PC shipments in the third quarter, capturing a 25.5% market share. 市占率方面，联想以 1940 万台的三季度 PC 出货量占据 25.5% 市场份额，继续稳居全球第一。

Furthermore, Lenovo achieved a year-on-year growth rate of 17.3%, nearly double the market average , leading all top five manufacturers. 此外， 联想实现了 17.3% 的同比增速，几乎是市场平均水平的两倍 ，领先于所有前五大厂商。

Among them, HP Inc. ranked second with a 19.8% market share, while Dell Technologies saw its market share decline from 14.2% in the same period last year to 13.3% due to sluggish growth. 其中，惠普（HP Inc.）以 19.8% 的市占率位居第二，戴尔（Dell Technologies）则因增长乏力，市场份额从去年同期的 14.2% 下滑至 13.3%。

IDC pointed out that Lenovo is accelerating its lead expansion by leveraging its efficient supply chain and extensive enterprise channels. IDC 指出，联想凭借高效的供应链和广泛的企业渠道，正在加速扩大领先优势。

Lenovo stated that its unique ODM+ manufacturing model and "global resources with local delivery" operational strategy enable the company to maintain stable supply and rapid delivery in a complex global trade environment. 联想方面表示，其独特的 ODM+制造模式以及「全球资源与本地交付」的运营策略，使公司能够在复杂的全球贸易环境下保持稳定供应和快速交付。

Market research firm Canalys predicts that by 2028, AI PC shipments are expected to account for 70% of the total, with a compound annual growth rate of 44% from 2024 to 2028. 市场研究机构 Canalys 预测，到 2028 年 AI PC 出货量占比有望达到 70%，2024 至 2028 年的复合增速将达 44%。

Previously released Q1 25/26 fiscal year reports show that Lenovo's AI PC shipments already account for over 30% of total PC shipments, and its Windows AI PC market share remains firmly at number one globally. 此前公布的 25/26 财年 Q1 报告显示，联想 AI PC 出货量已占整体 PC 出货量的 30% 以上，Windows AI PC 市场份额稳居全球第一。

item.title: 💡 前 Google CEO：AI 模型或被黑客利用「学会杀人」
item.guid: 💡-前-Google-CEO：AI-模型或被黑客利用「学会杀人」
item.description:
According to CNBC, former Google CEO Eric Schmidt warned about the potential risks of artificial intelligence at the recent Sifted Summit. 据 CNBC 报道，在日前举行的 Sifted Summit 上，前 Google CEO Eric Schmidt 对人工智能的潜在风险发出警告。

He stated that AI models could be vulnerable to hacking and even manipulated to learn dangerous skills. 他表示，AI 模型存在被黑客攻击的可能性，甚至可能被操纵以学习危险技能。

Evidence shows that both open-source and closed-source models can have their safety protections removed by hackers. During training, they learn many things, and a bad example is learning how to kill.

He emphasized that all major companies are currently working hard to prevent models from answering such questions, and are "doing a good job, for the right reasons." 他强调，目前所有主要公司都在努力阻止模型回答此类问题，并且「做得很好，也出于正确的理由」。

However, he also warned that AI systems could still bypass security restrictions through methods like "prompt injection" or "jailbreaking." 但他同时提醒，AI 系统仍可能通过「提示注入」或「越狱」等方式被绕过安全限制。

Despite issuing stern warnings, Schmidt remains optimistic about the overall prospects of AI. He believes AI is an "underestimated" technology that will bring huge economic returns in the future. 尽管提出严峻警示，Schmidt 依然对 AI 的整体前景保持乐观。 他认为 AI 是一种「被低估的」技术，未来将带来巨大的经济回报。

The explosive growth from the GPT series to ChatGPT demonstrates the power of this technology. I believe its potential will become even more apparent in the next 5 to 10 years.

Schmidt added that an effective "non-proliferation mechanism" to address the risk of AI misuse has not yet been established, but he believes long-term investors are willing to take risks precisely because they are optimistic about AI's long-term economic value. Schmidt 还补充， 目前尚未建立有效的「防扩散机制」来应对 AI 被滥用的风险，但他相信长期投资者之所以愿意承担风险，正是因为他们看好 AI 的长期经济价值。

item.title: vivo 正式发布 OriginOS 6 与 BlueOS 3
item.guid: vivo-正式发布-OriginOS-6-与-BlueOS-3
item.description:
At the 2025 Developer Conference held yesterday, vivo officially released comprehensive upgrade plans for OriginOS 6 and BlueOS 3, and announced that its Blue Heart AI strategy has entered a new phase. 在昨日举行的 2025 开发者大会上，vivo 正式发布了 OriginOS 6 与 BlueOS 3 的全面升级方案，并宣布蓝心智能战略进入新阶段。

Shi Yujian, Senior Vice President and CTO of vivo, stated at the conference that amidst the AI wave, vivo will adhere to the "More Local More Global" philosophy, striving to become a bridge connecting the physical and digital worlds. vivo 高级副总裁、首席技术官施玉坚在会上表示，AI 浪潮下，vivo 将坚持「More Local More Global」的理念，致力于成为连接物理世界与数字世界的桥梁。

Highlights of this conference include: 本次大会的重点包括：

  • Blue Heart AI Strategy: Launching a 3B edge-side multimodal inference large model with language, speech, image, and logical reasoning capabilities, and debuting the "Blue Heart Personal Intelligence Framework" to evolve AI from a tool into a "smart partner"; 蓝心智能战略：推出 3B 端侧多模态推理大模型，具备语言、语音、图像和逻辑推理能力，并首发「蓝心个人智能框架」，让 AI 从工具进化为「智能伙伴」；
  • OriginOS 6: Introducing the "Blue River Smooth Engine," along with features like "AI Sleep Mode" and "AI Full-Scene Bionic Brightness"; the first batch of models to feature it includes the vivo X300 series, iQOO Neo11 series, etc.; OriginOS 6：引入「蓝河流畅引擎」，同时上线「AI 舒眠模式」「AI 全场景仿生亮度」等功能，首批搭载机型包括 vivo X300 系列、iQOO Neo11 系列等；
  • BlueOS 3: Positioned as the "cornerstone of AI-native devices," it is entirely written in Rust, enhancing security and fluidity, and will debut on the vivo WATCH GT 2, offering up to 33 days of battery life; BlueOS 3：定位为「AI 原生设备的基石」，全栈采用 Rust 语言编写，强化安全性与流畅性，并首发搭载于 vivo WATCH GT 2，带来最长 33 天续航；
  • Ecosystem Interconnection: Across in-car, home, office, and other scenarios, launching features like "Mirror Small Window 2.0" and "One-Sentence Home Control," and achieving interconnection with the Apple ecosystem; 生态互联：跨车机、家居、办公等场景，推出「镜像小窗 2.0」「一句话控家」等功能，并实现与苹果生态的互联互通；
  • Humanitarian Care: Providing barrier-free experiences for hearing-impaired and visually-impaired groups through features like "vivo Hear" and "vivo See," promoting technological inclusivity. 人文关怀：通过「vivo 听说」「vivo 看见」等功能，为听障、视障群体提供无障碍体验，推动科技普惠。

With the implementation of OriginOS 6 and BlueOS 3, vivo stated that it will continue to work with developers and partners to jointly build an open and trustworthy smart ecosystem. 随着 OriginOS 6 与 BlueOS 3 的落地，vivo 表示将继续携手开发者与合作伙伴，共同构建开放、可信赖的智慧生态。

item.title: 前 iPhone 设计师操刀，法拉利首款电动车 Elettrica 技术细节曝光
item.guid: 前-iPhone-设计师操刀，法拉利首款电动车-Elettrica-技术细节曝光
item.description:
According to The Verge, Italian supercar manufacturer Ferrari showcased the core technologies of its first electric car, Elettrica, including the battery pack and powertrain, at its Maranello headquarters, but the overall vehicle design has not yet been revealed. 据 The Verge 报道，意大利超级跑车制造商法拉利在马拉内洛总部展示了其首款电动车 Elettrica 的核心技术，包括电池组与动力系统，但整车造型仍未公开。

  • Power Performance: The motor can output up to 1000 horsepower in acceleration mode, accelerating from 0-100km/h in 2.5 seconds, with a top speed of 310.6km/h; 动力性能：电机在加速模式下可输出最高 1000 马力，0-100km/h 加速用时 2.5 秒，最高时速可达 310.6km/h；
  • Range and Battery: Equipped with a 15-module nickel-manganese-cobalt battery, with a total energy of 122kWh, offering a WLTP range of approximately 530km; it adopts an 800-volt architecture, supporting fast charging up to 350kW; 续航与电池：配备 15 模块镍锰钴电池，总能量 122kWh，WLTP 工况下续航里程约 530km；采用 800 伏架构，支持最高 350kW 快充；
  • Driving Experience: Features independent motors, rear-wheel steering, and an active suspension system, eliminating traditional anti-roll bars. The vehicle will also capture motor vibrations via accelerometers and use "proprietary algorithms" to amplify the sound, creating a unique engine note; 驾驶体验：搭载独立电机、后轮转向与主动悬挂系统，取消传统防倾杆。车辆还将通过加速度计捕捉电机振动，并利用「专有算法」放大声音，营造独特声浪；
  • Body Design: The new car will adopt a four-door, four-plus-seat layout, making it the brand's first four-door model, potentially positioned close to the Purosangue SUV; 75% of the chassis material is recycled aluminum; 车身设计：新车将采用四门四座以上布局，是品牌历史上首款四门车型，定位或接近 Purosangue SUV、底盘材料中 75% 为回收铝；

    • Price and Positioning: The estimated starting price is at least 500,000 euros (approximately 4.12 million RMB), targeting a new generation of high-net-worth individuals.

It is worth mentioning that "Elettrica" will be designed in collaboration with Lovefrom, the design company of former iPhone designer Jony Ive. Many of Apple's famous products—the iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, and the original Apple Watch—were designed by Jony Ive's team. 值得一提的是，「Elettrica」将由法拉利与前 iPhone 设计师乔纳森·伊夫的设计公司 Lovefrom 合作设计，苹果诸多著名产品——iPhone 5s、iPhone 6、初代 Apple Watch 等均由乔纳森带领的设计团队操刀。

Currently, "Elettrica" is still a temporary name, and the final production version is expected to officially debut in 2026. 目前，「Elettrica」仍是临时命名，最终量产版预计将在 2026 年正式亮相。

item.title: 努比亚 Z80 Ultra 本月将在影视飓风登场
item.guid: 努比亚-Z80-Ultra-本月将在影视飓风登场
item.description:
Yesterday, Nubia officially announced on its WeChat public account that it will hold a new product launch event this month at "Yingshi Jufeng" (Film & TV Hurricane), introducing its new flagship model "Z80 Ultra" with the slogan "The first phone launch event held at Yingshi Jufeng." 昨天，努比亚在微信公众号官宣，将于本月在「影视飓风」举办新品发布会，推出新一代旗舰机型「Z80 Ultra」，并打出 slogan「首场在影视飓风举办的手机发布会」。

According to official information, the theme of this launch event is "From STORMBASE to STORMLANDING," emphasizing the combination of imaging and performance. Nubia stated that the new phone will continue the Ultra series' positioning and further optimize its imaging system. 根据官方信息，本次发布会主题为「从 STORMBASE 到 STORMLANDING」，强调影像与性能的结合。努比亚方面称，新机将延续 Ultra 系列的定位，并在影像系统上进行进一步优化。

item.title: 联想 moto X70 Air 将于月底亮相
item.guid: 联想-moto-X70-Air-将于月底亮相
item.description:
Lenovo moto's official Weibo recently released a preview, announcing that it will launch a new model, "moto X70 Air," at the end of this month. 联想 moto 官方微博日前发布预告，宣布将于本月底推出全新机型「moto X70 Air」。

The official slogan for the new phone is "Light at your fingertips, AI in your grasp," emphasizing that the device will bring a better AI experience. 官方公布了新机的 slogan，为「轻在指尖，AI 在掌握」，并强调该机将带来更好的 AI 体验。

From the pre-release information, "moto X70 Air" will feature a lightweight and thin design as its main selling point, combined with AI functions, focusing on intelligent usage scenarios. Although specific configurations have not yet been announced, some netizens in the comments section are already curious about its camera and battery life performance. 从预热信息来看，「moto X70 Air」将以轻薄设计为主要卖点，同时结合 AI 功能，主打智能化使用场景。虽然目前尚未公布具体配置，但已有网友在评论区关注其拍照与续航表现。

Since its acquisition by Lenovo in 2014, moto has launched multiple product lines: the early moto Z series attracted attention with its modular design, while the razr foldable screen series revived the classic flip-phone form factor and has become an important player in the global foldable phone market in recent years. 自 2014 年被联想收购以来，moto 已推出多条产品线：早期的 moto Z 系列以模块化设计吸引关注，razr 折叠屏系列则复刻经典翻盖造型，并在近年成为全球折叠屏市场的重要玩家。

As for the X series, a lineup of bar-style flagships, it has successively introduced the "X30" (the first to feature Snapdragon 8 Gen1), the "X30 Pro" (equipped with a 200-megapixel main camera), and the "X40" (featuring Snapdragon 8 Gen2), gradually establishing its position as a "bar-style flagship." 而作为直板旗舰序列的 X 系列，先后带来过首发骁龙 8 Gen1 的「X30」、搭载 2 亿像素主摄的「X30 Pro」、以及搭载骁龙 8 Gen2 的「X40」，逐渐形成「直板旗舰」定位。

item.title: 西贝贾国龙回应门头更换：小范围尝试，不会全国普及
item.guid: 西贝贾国龙回应门头更换：小范围尝试，不会全国普及
item.description:
According to Sina Finance, it was recently discovered by netizens that the Xibei restaurant at Beijing Shijingshan Wanda changed its facade. The logo's red and white color scheme was replaced with white and green, and "Youmian Village" was replaced with "I'm from the Grasslands." 据新浪财经报道，近日，有网友发现，北京石景山万达的西贝餐厅更换了门头，Logo 由红白配色改为白绿配色，「莜面村」也被替换为「我从草原来」。

In response, Jia Guolong, founder and chairman of Xibei, replied: "This is just a small-scale attempt and will not be rolled out to all stores nationwide. In the future, perhaps one or two stores in central cities will use the new slogan and Logo, just like Starbucks has its Reserve Roasteries and factory stores." 对此，西贝创始人、董事长贾国龙回应称： 「这只是一个小范围的尝试，不会普及到全国门店。未来或许在中心城市会有一两家店铺使用新标语和 Logo，就像星巴克有黑标店、工厂店一样。」

Regarding the previous "100 yuan dine-in voucher" that led to a "coupon-clipping" phenomenon, Jia Guolong stated: "These consumers are all very kind, and we are essentially treating them. When you treat guests, you should be generous. Since they came, all who come are guests, and we treat everyone equally." 而针对此前「100 元堂食代金券」引发的「薅羊毛」现象，贾国龙表示： 「这些消费者都很善良，我们也相当于请客。请客就要大大方方的，既然来了，来的都是客，我们还是一视同仁的。」

item.title: M stand 联动 SooyaStudio 打造「Ban」主题特调与盲盒手办
item.guid: M-stand-联动-SooyaStudio-打造「Ban」主题特调与盲盒手办
item.description:
Recently, chain coffee brand M Stand collaborated with trendy toy brand SooyaStudio to launch a new co-branded series based on the classic IP character Ban. This collaboration not only brings specially formulated drinks but also simultaneously releases multiple peripheral products. 近日，连锁咖啡品牌 M stand 携手潮玩品牌 SooyaStudio，以经典 IP 形象 Ban 为原型推出全新联名系列。此次合作不仅带来特别调制的饮品，还同步上线多款周边产品。

According to reports, this "co-branded special" is a Wogan carrot sparkling Americano, blending pineapple and green pomelo flavored espresso, offering a refreshing taste with distinct layers. 据介绍，本次「联名特调」为沃柑胡萝卜气泡美式，融合凤梨与青柚风味意式浓缩，口感清爽且层次分明。

In addition to beverages, both parties also launched a "co-branded blind box" coffee series of figurines, transforming Rabbit Ban and Cat Ban into fun characters of the coffee kingdom, creating a sense of comforting companionship in the palm of your hand. 除饮品外，双方还推出「联名盲盒」咖啡系列手办，让兔子 Ban 与猫咪 Ban 化身咖啡王国的趣味角色，营造掌心治愈的陪伴感。

Furthermore, co-branded merchandise includes mug blind boxes and magnetic card holders, aiming to extend Ban's healing power to daily use scenarios. Currently, the series has officially launched in official stores. 此外，联名周边包括马克杯盲盒与磁吸卡包等，旨在将 Ban 的治愈力延伸至日常使用场景。目前，该系列已在官方门店正式上线。

item.title: lululemon「一起好状态」登陆上海星美术馆
item.guid: lululemon「一起好状态」登陆上海星美术馆
item.description:
Recently, the athletic lifestyle brand lululemon launched its fifth annual "Feel Good Together" themed event at the Star Art Museum in Shanghai. 近日，运动生活方式品牌 lululemon 于上海星美术馆开启第五年「一起好状态」主题活动。

This year, lululemon collaborated with artist Geoff McFetridge to present the "Feel Good Movement Field," encouraging the public to explore physical and mental balance through the combination of movement and art. 今年，lululemon 携手艺术家 Geoff McFetridge 呈现「好状态趣动场」，通过运动与艺术结合，鼓励公众探索身心平衡。

According to reports, the "Feel Good Movement Field" features five major areas: "Yoga Stretch," "Reflect," "Move," "Run," and "Playfield," covering various experiences such as yoga, running, and training. 据介绍，「好状态趣动场」设置了「Yoga 身展」「Reflect 思所」「Move 身动」「Run 奔跑」「Playfield 趣动广场」五大区域，涵盖瑜伽、跑步、训练等多种体验。

From now until October 15, lululemon will host over 60 free classes on-site and collaborate with the charity organization 'Dark Run Crew' to conduct inclusive running events. 即日起至 10 月 15 日，lululemon 将在现场举办 60 余节免费课程，并联合公益机构「黑暗跑团」开展融合跑活动。

On the day of the event, lululemon brand ambassador Li Yuchun appeared and engaged in a 'Dialogue on Well-being' with Peng Kaiping, a professor from Tsinghua University's Department of Psychology and Cognitive Sciences. 活动当天，lululemon 品牌大使李宇春现身，与清华大学心理与认知科学系教授彭凯平展开「对话好状态」。

Li Yuchun stated: 'Daring to try new things is how I find my good state.' In addition, guests such as scholar Xiang Biao, actress Yao Chen, and writer Zhai Yongming will also participate in sharing, and the related content will be produced as a podcast and released online. 李宇春表示：「勇于尝试新鲜事物，就是我找到好状态的方式。」此外，学者项飙、演员姚晨、作家翟永明等嘉宾也将参与分享，相关内容将制作成播客上线。

Huang Shanyan, Managing Director of lululemon China, revealed that on October 27, the lululemon China Store Support Center will officially open in Shanghai West Bund Central, further promoting the brand's long-term development in the Chinese market. lululemon 中国区董事总经理黄山燕透露，10 月 27 日，lululemon 中国门店支持中心将正式入驻上海西岸中環，进一步推动品牌在中国市场的长期发展。

The official statement indicates that the 'Well-being Fun Field' will successively launch in five cities—Shenyang, Shenzhen, Chengdu, Wuhan, and Guangzhou—in October. National stores will also simultaneously introduce the 'Together for Well-being' series of courses, which users can register for free via the 'Sweat Life' mini-program. 官方表示，「好状态趣动场」将在 10 月陆续登陆沈阳、深圳、成都、武汉、广州五座城市，全国门店也将同步推出「一起好状态」系列课程，用户可通过「热汗生活」小程序免费报名参与。

item.title: 多邻国推出动画短剧《最後の決戦》：10 月 13 日上线
item.guid: 多邻国推出动画短剧《最後の決戦》：10-月-13-日上线
item.description:
Recently, Duolingo announced the launch of its original animated short series 'Saigo no Kessen' (The Final Battle), which will premiere on its official YouTube channel on October 13. The series consists of 5 episodes, each approximately 1 minute long, co-produced by Duolingo and animation studio Titmouse. 近日，多邻国宣布推出原创动画短剧「最後の決戦」，将于 10 月 13 日在官方 YouTube 频道上线。该系列共 5 集，每集约 1 分钟，由多邻国与动画工作室 Titmouse 联合制作。

According to the introduction, the short series features Japanese voice acting and offers multi-language subtitles including English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Hindi, Korean, and Thai. 据介绍，短剧采用日语配音，并提供英语、西班牙语、葡萄牙语、法语、德语、印地语、韩语、泰语等多语言字幕。

The plot revolves around the mascot Duo and his friends, telling how they protect their 'learning streak' when facing challenges. 剧情围绕吉祥物多儿与伙伴们展开，讲述他们在面对挑战时如何守护「学习连胜」。

This launch coincides with the release of the new Japanese course, and Duolingo hopes to attract users to learn languages through a more entertaining format. The platform currently offers over 40 language courses and has expanded into fields such as mathematics, music, and chess. 此次上线正值新版日语课程发布，多邻国希望通过更具娱乐性的形式吸引用户学习语言。目前平台已提供超过 40 种语言课程，并扩展至数学、音乐和国际象棋等领域。

item.title: 《一战再战》预售开启，10 月 17 日登陆内地院线
item.guid: 《一战再战》预售开启，10-月-17-日登陆内地院线
item.description:
Yesterday, the annual blockbuster 'The War Again,' written, directed, and produced by Paul Thomas Anderson and starring Leonardo DiCaprio, officially began pre-sales on major platforms. The film will be released in mainland China on October 17. 昨天，由保罗・托马斯・安德森编剧、执导并担任制片，莱昂纳多・迪卡普里奥领衔主演的年度大片《一战再战》正式在各大平台开启预售，影片将于 10 月 17 日在中国内地上映。

The official release also included the 'Lone Hero's Quest for Daughter' trailer and a China-exclusive poster. The story follows father Bob (played by Leonardo DiCaprio) as he embarks on a perilous journey to rescue his daughter Vera (played by Chase Infiniti), engaging in a 16-year fated battle with his arch-nemesis Colonel Rockjaw (played by Sean Penn), with the assistance of 'The Master' (played by Benicio Del Toro). 官方同步发布「孤勇寻女」预告与中国独家海报，故事讲述父亲鲍勃（莱昂纳多・迪卡普里奥 饰）为营救女儿薇拉（蔡斯・英菲尼迪 饰），与宿敌洛克乔上校（西恩・潘 饰）展开一场跨越 16 年的宿命之战，并在「大师」（本尼西奥・德尔・托罗 饰）的协助下踏上惊险旅程。

The film received rave reviews at the 9th Pingyao International Film Festival and overseas screenings, boasting a 98% recommendation rate from major influencers, a 98% Rotten Tomatoes score, and an MTC score of 96, making it the highest-rated film of the past decade and considered the 'strongest contender' for the Oscar awards season. 影片在第九届平遥国际电影展及海外放映中口碑爆棚，大 V 推荐度高达 98%、烂番茄新鲜度 98%、MTC 评分 96，成为近十年综合评分最高的电影，被视为奥斯卡颁奖季的「最强种子选手」。

Unlike traditional action films that rely on special effects, 'The War Again' was entirely shot using VistaVision film cameras. Director Anderson even personally designed the car chase scenes, and the lead actors performed high-difficulty stunts themselves, striving to create an ultimate sense of immersion. 与传统动作片依赖特效不同，《一战再战》全程采用 VistaVision 胶片摄影机实拍完成，导演安德森甚至亲自设计追车戏份，主演们也亲自完成高难度特技动作，力求营造极致的临场感。

item.title: 《阳光俱乐部》定档 10 月 25 日
item.guid: 《阳光俱乐部》定档-10-月-25-日
item.description:
The film 'Sunshine Club,' directed by Wei Shujun, produced by Wang Caitao, and starring Huang Xiaoming, announced its release date today. It will premiere nationwide on October 25, with a synchronized release of its official trailer and poster. 由魏书钧执导、王才涛担任制片人，黄晓明领衔主演的电影《阳光俱乐部》今日宣布定档，将于 10 月 25 日全国上映，并同步发布定档预告与海报。

It is reported that the main cast of this film includes Huang Xiaoming, Lu Xiaofen, Zu Feng, Jia Zhangke, Yang Caiyu, Tong Linkai, and Li Yang, with special appearances by Zhang Qi, Liao Fan, and Liang Zhi. 据悉，本片的主演阵容包括黄晓明、陆小芬、祖峰、贾樟柯、杨采钰、佟林楷、李杨，特别出演包括张淇、廖凡、梁植。

The film tells the story of Wu You (played by Huang Xiaoming), whose intellect remains at a childlike stage. After joining the 'Sunshine Club,' he becomes a senior partner, but when his mother suddenly falls critically ill, he embarks on a completely different path to save her. 影片讲述智力停留在孩童阶段的吴优（黄晓明 饰），在加入「阳光俱乐部」后成为高级合伙人，却在母亲突患重病时走上截然不同的救母之路。

The official tagline emphasizes 'the power of sunshine and love,' hoping that audiences will find healing and reflection through the film. 官方宣传语强调「阳光与爱的力量」，希望观众在银幕中获得治愈与思考。
